body:
Revised #27770
Successfully built versions 1.6.4 and 1.7.0 on linux-rhel8-zen3.
For versions before 1.7.0, degrade CPU target to znver2 on a zen3 build.

$ spack find julia
==> 2 installed packages
-- linux-rhel8-zen3 / gcc@11.2.0-nscc ---------------------------
julia@1.6.4  julia@1.7.0
title: (revised) julia: update versions and add znver3 to Julia's CPU target
